instruction: Given a customer inquiry about a product, provide an adequate response and suggest related product(s), if needed.
input: Customer Inquiry: I am looking for a new laptop.
output: Thanks for choosing [Product Name]. We have a few laptops that will suit your needs. If you are looking for something lightweight and portable, then the [product name] is a great choice. It has a long-lasting battery and a powerful processor, perfect for everyday use. If you're looking for something with more power, then the [product name] might be right for you. It has a large screen, a powerful graphics card, and plenty of RAM for multitasking. We also recommend the [product name] if you need a laptop with excellent sound quality and portability. Let us know if you need any more help!
